official_title: Correlating Brain Tissue Oxygen Tension (PbrO2) and Regional Cerebral Oximetry (rSO2) in Normal Human Brain Under the Conditions of Changing Ventilation Strategy
inclusion_criteria:
* Patients who are scheduled for elective removal of secondary cerebral metastases under general anesthesia.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Patients will be excluded if they refuse to give consent, have evidence of elevated intracranial pressure on preoperative CT scan, have coagulopathy, are taking therapeutic agents known to increase bleeding risk, have a history of cardiovascular disease, cerebrovascular disease, suffer from respiratory failure, or are not fluent English speakers.
